Banner.Description: With over 10 years of experience in web design and development, I have honed my skills in structure, functionality, configuration, testing, delivery, and maintenance. My expertise extends to web application design, architecture, implementation, and integration. I am known for being a responsible, intelligent professional who is process-oriented, a fast learner, and a self-starter. I excel in problem-solving and stay updated with the latest technologies and standards. Possessing excellent communication skills, I work effectively both independently and as a productive team member, capable of taking on leadership and mentoring roles. My motivation and commitment to excellence make me a valuable asset in any professional setting.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 10 years of experience I've covered many roles: System Analyst, Frontend Developer, Backend Developer and Technical Leader. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing improvements in systems, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.

I also program things for my personal use, whether as a hobby or for utility. I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with ExpressJS, NestJs, MongoDB and Mysql. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular Tech. Lead
Description: Technical decision leader
Technical talent recruitment for the company
Department of Technology team leader
Creation and maintenance of an internal process management platform for sales courses
Programming of custom functions and plugins for customization of a WordPress platform
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Planning meetings with reports.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular Team Lead
Description: Enhanced Angular application efficiency by 20% through strategic package optimization, eliminating unnecessary components from existing upgrades.
Directed and oversaw the daily activities of team members, ensuring effective work prioritization and maintaining high quality standards.
Provided mentorship and coaching to team members, fostering successful performance and skill development.
Delegated tasks based on project requirements and individual strengths, optimizing resource allocation.
Collaborated with management to prioritize assignments in alignment with current issues and business priorities.
Facilitated communication among team members, promoting increased productivity and meeting weekly deadlines.
Engineered a customized Angular module for a client, reducing development time by 40% and enhancing team productivity by 25%.
Teamed up with the back-end development team to construct a RESTful API, resulting in a 30% improvement in overall application performance and reduced load times.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular Consultant
Description: Architected, developed, and designed a web application using Angular 10, later migrating it to Angular 12 with TypeScript.
Played a key role in crafting responsive web design using HTML, CSS, SASS (variables), and Flexbox.
Implemented Promises and Observables for asynchronous/synchronous services as needed.
Integrated Telerik & Kendo UI for efficient data representation, filtering, and other UI elements.
Utilized Lazy loading and parameterization for passing data through the Router module, including activatedRoute.
Engineered the HTTP client to interact with the server/backend and modularized the application with the Ng Module.
Employed Angular routers, CanActivate, and CanDeactivate routes for seamless navigation between tiles/pages.
Developed custom pipes and directives to optimize data transformation for a real-time user experience.
Implemented NgRx for managing session state, user authentication, and administrative access and functionality.
Created a notification service utilizing RxJS subjects and SMTP services to send daily stock, sales, and purchase information via email.
Established cross-component communications using @Output and @Input decorators.
Collaborated closely with back-end developers to integrate RapNET data, ensuring the availability of the latest details about diamonds to support daily sales and purchase operations.
Designed and implemented administrative dashboards displaying real-time statistics and pricing using chart.js.
Conducted manual testing in adherence to the Test Driven Development (TDD) environment after code implementation.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Sr. Software Developer
Description: Identified and executed codebase improvements to enhance overall code quality.
Implemented responsive design principles, utilizing Angular Material, Twitter Bootstrap, CSS/SCSS, and media queries to ensure seamless mobile compatibility for web applications.
Integrated third-party APIs into web applications through RESTful services and AJAX calls.
Developed single-page applications using AngularJS, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Engineered reusable components to expedite the development of new features in subsequent projects.
Led the migration of legacy applications from older technologies to modern frameworks like Angular 8+, contributing to the creation of high-quality code for diverse projects.
Provided routine coaching and training to newly hired software engineers, offering mentorship for their professional development.
Leveraged APIs to supply data to web applications, optimizing functionality.
Managed concurrent involvement in multiple projects, delivering short-term project services.
Conducted thorough code reviews to ensure adherence to quality standards within development teams.
Collaborated closely with the graphic designer and H TML coder to establish a clear dependency chain, resulting in a 20% reduction in development time and a 10% increase in overall code quality

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Provided support for end users by resolving issues related to the deployed applications.
Collaborated with other developers to integrate multiple systems through APIs.
Maintained databases by writing S QL queries and stored procedures.
Used AJAX to create interactive user experiences on websites with partial page updates.
Collaborated with UI and UX designers to build intuitive user interfaces with modern design.
Patterns like Material Design or Bootstrap 3.0+ frameworks.
Developed and implemented ASP.NET web applications using C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery.
Implemented authentication methods such as Windows Authentication and Forms-based authentication for secure access to websites.
Integrated third-party APIs into existing web applications.
Configured IIS Web Server to host websites and applications.
Developed custom websites to meet individual client needs.
Created clean, well-documented custom code and updates.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Developer
Description: Developed and implemented ASP.NET web applications using C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript jQuery.
Developed custom websites to meet individual client needs.
Created clean, well-documented custom code and updates.
Built responsive layouts using media queries for mobile devices so that content is optimized across all platforms including tablets, and phones.
Utilized SQL Server Management Studio to develop database objects like stored procedures, triggers, views, and functions.
Used AJAX to create interactive user experiences on websites with partial page updates.
Analyzed system requirements from business stakeholders to create technical specifications documents that meet customer needs.
Created custom controls for web forms to provide a consistent look and feel across the entire website.
Deployed websites onto IIS 7 and 8 servers using Visual Studio Team Services.
Renewed domain name registrations.
Recommended and implemented performance improvements.
Performed and directed Web site updates.
Backed up files from websites to local directories for instant recovery.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Jr. Software Developer
Description: Researched new technologies and frameworks to improve existing systems.
Performed unit testing on developed applications to ensure functionality before deployment.
Evaluated third-party libraries and frameworks used in developing applications.
Collaborated with other developers to design efficient solutions for programming problems.
Maintained understanding of current web technologies and programming practices through continuing education and participation in professional conferences and workshops.

FeatureProjects.Title: Creative Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Delmonte : Product Management and Sales Monitoring System
Description: Web application for internal company management that covers sales, billing, and extensive and complex tracking departments, made with Angular and Node.Js.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: The KUBE : Digital Hospital Transformation
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Project aims to revolutionize the healthcare experience by developing a comprehensive digital platform for hospitals. This project will integrate cutting-edge web technologies to streamline hospital operations, enhance patient care, and optimize healthcare management processes.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Moon Invoice :  Easy Invoice App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Moon Invoice is an innovative invoice application designed to streamline and optimize the invoicing process. This project was developed with a strong emphasis on collaboration, performance enhancement, and cutting-edge technologies. This projectaims to provide a seamless, efficient, and user-friendly invoicing solution, leveraging the latest technological advancements to meet the needs of modern businesses.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Sales & Purchase CRM
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plan quote that has a search engine with which advanced queries are made. Plans are displayed based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has online chatcontact form, notification system by whatsapp and mail, auth, and internet information management through the role of administrator.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Vehicle Lease Quote System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform belonging to water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Sytner Digital Service Booking App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The rock-paper-scissors game extended. A personal project developed in angular in which you play randomly against the machine. It has the use of services, interfaces, and components.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Motor Gruppen Planner
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An interface that consumes an API of countries with which you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
